spell1.name: SAVAGE CLAW
spell1.description: Slash with Adamantium claws for a Claw Strike. Unleashing Feral Leap will enhance it to Berserk Claw Strike for a brief period.

attributes.label: PERCENTAGE DAMAGE
attributes.value: Deal damage equal to 1.5% of the target's Max Health, with an extra 0.045% damage for each point of Rage

spell2.name: LAST STAND
spell2.description: Knock enemies ahead airborne and spiral through the air, sweeping up enemies along the path and delivering a devastating impact at the landing point.

attributes.label: IMPACT PERCENTAGE DAMAGE
attributes.value: Deal damage equal to 10% of the target's Max Health, with an extra 0.3% damage for each point of Rage

spell2.changeDescription: Impact knockdown reduced 1s → 0.75s; Bugfix (2025‑06‑19): Unstoppable targets no longer incorrectly sent flying

spell3.name: FERAL LEAP
spell3.description: Leap like an animal to snatch the first enemy upon impact and Smash them to the ground. Unleashing this ability will enhance his normal attack to Berserk Claw Strike for a brief period.

spell4.name: UNDYING ANIMAL
spell4.description: Unleash a fierce howl to briefly reduce incoming damage.

spell5.name: VICIOUS RAMPAGE
spell5.description: Dash forward and unleash a Claw Strike.

spell6.name: REGENERATIVE HEALING FACTOR
spell6.description: Begin to heal and rise with a hefty Bonus Health, shaking off all debuffs. After a brief moment, any remaining Bonus Health morphs into a one-off heal, zeroing out his Rage. Assists in KOs reduce this cooldown.

spell7.name: BERSERKER RAGE
spell7.description: Rage builds when Wolverine attacks or takes hits, boosting the damage of his Claw Strikes and the Bonus Health from his regenerative healing factor.

attributes.label: RAGE PER BERSERK CLAW STRIKE HIT

spell7.changeDescription: Rage gains rebalanced: SC 7→10 (buff), BCS 7→5 (nerf), Leap 20→10 (nerf), Rampage 20→15 (nerf), Hit Taken 3→5 (buff)

spell8.name: METAL CANNONBALL
spell8.description: Wolverine, Hulk, and The Thing can interact with each other. Once both parties confirm, Hulk can lift Wolverine and press the key to hurl him forward.

attributes.label: COOLDOWN
attributes.value: 3s when not hurled; 15s after hurling Wolverine
